name: Trapped (itch) (Kakapo_Daccapo)
description:
Trapped is a short RPG Action Game, created for the Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice, on July 2022.

It was a night just like the others for Timmy and his little sister Faye.

But, during the night, strange and creepy creatures kidnaps both of them...

Timmy find himself in a terrible jail, alone. He has to escape and try to save his sister.

A short horror game, fast, violent and claustrophobic in which you have to push forward by slashing with an axe and solve riddles to proceed. Make sure to be really careful to spiders!

This was my first Games Jam, I did it all by myself, it turned out to be a really fun, but exhausting experience! Surely there are some elements to fix, but I like how it turned out!

I made it with RPG Maker VX ACE, using Falcao Pearl ABS Liquid V3 Battle System as a base.

Attention, this game contains blood, violence and spiders.

Also, English is not my first language. I probably made some (or a lot of) mistakes!
